paragraphs.text: The Creeping Crystal Triad is an organized crime unit in Republic City run by Jargala Omo. They are named after the crystal jennamite and have a fierce rivalry with the Triple Threat Triad. Following the events of the invasion of the United Republic of Nations, they lost a majority of their turf to the Triple Threat Triad under Tokuga but teamed up with Korra and the rest of Team Avatar to defeat Tokuga and the Triple Threats.

paragraphs.body: The Creeping Crystal Triad was one of Republic City's triads. Following the events from the invasion of the United Republic of Nations, they got involved in multiple clashes with Tokuga and the Triple Threat Triad. During one such clash, the triad was all but defeated by Triple Threat Triad, as multiple members had been knocked unconscious and Jargala was immobile due to her chi having been blocked by Tokuga. Tokuga said she should surrender, but Jargala told him he would have to make her. Before he could strike, however, the ${link_0} arrived to break u the fight; both triads then retreated, hoping to avoid being arrested.

paragraphs.body: The following evening, the triad received a visit from Korra, Mako, and Bolin. Korra attacked multiple members and demanded Jargala reveal where she had hidden Asami Sato. Jargala told the Avatar that Asami was not at the hideout but was welcome to search the premises if she needed to. Upon their unsuccessful search, Jargala taunted the group and told them to leave.
